title: :: Death of Rachel Hoffmann
subtitle: The 23-year-old Rachel Hoffman was killed by drug dealers after she was pressured to hand over an informant for a small possession charge.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A 23-year-old student at the University of Florida was arrested for possession of marijuana and forced to work as an informant; she was then killed by drug dealers who found that she was wearing a wire.
